sentences.sContent: Nobel for each and every one of us.
sentences.sContent_eng: Nobel for each and every one of us.
sentences.sCn: 一个我们每一个人的诺贝尔和平奖。

sentences.sContent: Then, everyone competed in each event, one by one.
sentences.sContent_eng: Then, everyone competed in each event, one by one.
sentences.sCn: 接着，人人一个接一个地在每项活动中比赛。

phrases.pCn: 人人，各人，每人，个个，各个
全部，个个；全体，人人，大家都，统统；没有例外

trans.tranCn: 每人， 每个， 每件
